subject: Self Care
title: The Power of Community
description: A quick win: understand The Power of Community.

hook.text: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with. Their habits become your habits.

buildup.text: Social influence is the most underrated force in habit change. We mimic those around us unconsciously.

discovery.text: The Framingham study showed obesity spreads through social networks. Fitness does too. Habits are contagious.

twist.text: Joining a group where your desired behavior is the norm makes that behavior feel natural, not forced.

climax.text: Find your tribe. Surround yourself with people who already live the way you want to. Let their habits infect.

punchline.text: Join the right group. Their habits become yours.

quiz.question: What did the Framingham study reveal about habits?
options: Health behaviors like obesity and fitness spread through social networks
